trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>只發生事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件很實用，當您想要顯示的捷徑功能表，取決於資料列的目前狀態或包含的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>您指定的處理常式中的捷徑功能表會顯示事件，每當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下資料列除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件覆寫已按下的特定資料格的捷徑功能表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件也會發生值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>屬性來判斷的值或資料列的狀態變更或修改使用這項資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會使用資料列的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性，事件就會覆寫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的資料列設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>多個資料列的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `rowIndex` parameter value to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會使用`rowIndex`參數值來初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndex為小於-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the row that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定產生的資料列的捷徑功能表<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a row.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性一開始包含值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，如果已設定的資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> in use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> in use.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row that is requesting a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得要求的快顯功能表的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve additional information about the row.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來擷取資料列的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row that is requesting a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 要求快顯功能表的資料列的以零為起始的索引。
